title: Lands Of Lore 1 - The Throne of Chaos + midi [TEMPLAYER]
description:
1 Mount the image
2 Install (check compatibility for old windowses)
3 after install use Dosbox
4 enter- mount D "your mounted cd drive with LOL" -t cdrom
5 then- mount C "Your installed directory with LoL"
6 then- C:
7 Then- LOLCD.exe

play

If you want to play again, go from 4 - 7

If your game runs sluggish enter these before step 7:
C:>core dynamic
C:>cycles max
